full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Microsoft Surface Laptop SE or Equivalent Notebooks for DND

**Solicitation Details**

- **Solicitation Number**: BPM018922/22874
- **Publication Date**: 2023-06-12
- **Close Date**: 2023-06-28 14:00:00

**Procurement Details**

* **Vendor Profile**: To access the solicitation and submit your bid, please click the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login 
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence requires 500 Notebooks, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation. This Equipment will be used to support education and training cadets. Delivery will be to various locations and the delivery date is 45 federal government working days from contract award.

- **Relevant Clauses and Regs**: Exigences relatives à la sécurité: N/A
- **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA)**: N/A

**Selection Criteria and Award**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Notice and Inquiry**

* All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to Sorn Prak, Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada.
* Address: 400 Cooper St, 6th floor, Ottawa Ontario, K2P 2H8
* Email: [Sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 298-2073

**Tender Attachments**

Please find the relevant documents here: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B30E8D1F-CDC1-49DA-9693-1B84DB9DC15F, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B094173C-75BE-496E-A7EA-675137F57C31 etc. 

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
**Procurement Category**: Goods - General
**Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
**Regions of Opportunity**: World
**
